us.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people
us.translation[0].definitions[0].example: He arranged for us all to have a drink.
My mother is coming to stay with us.
Life is hard for us women.
us.translation[0].definitions[1].example: Global warming will affect all of us.
us.translation[0].definitions[2].definit: used instead of ‘me’. Many people think this use is incorrect
